xwikidoc.name: MachineTranslationTranslations
xwikidoc.creator: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.author: xwiki:XWiki.Admin
xwikidoc.content:
# Class fields XWiki.MachineTranslation.TranslatorClass_title=Title
machinetranslation.translate=Translate machinetranslation.translations=Translations machinetranslation.availableTranslations=Available translations machinetranslation.actions=Actions machinetranslation.actions.translate=Translate machinetranslation.translate.modal.title=Translations machinetranslation.translate.modal.translate=Translate machinetranslation.translate.modal.translate.inProgress=Translating... machinetranslation.translate.modal.close=Close machinetranslation.translate.modal.originalDocument=Original document : machinetranslation.translate.modal.translation.language=Language machinetranslation.translate.modal.translation.title=Title machinetranslation.translate.modal.translation.date=Date machinetranslation.translate.returnToDocument=Return to document to access translations
admin.machinetranslation=Machine Translation admin.machinetranslation.usage=Usage admin.machinetranslation.glossary=Glossary admin.machinetranslation.usage.values=Character usage for current period: {0} of {1} admin.machinetranslation.test.textToTranslate=Text admin.machinetranslation.test.sourceLanguage=Source language admin.machinetranslation.test.targetLanguage=Target language admin.machinetranslation.test=Translation test admin.machinetranslation.test.translate=Translate
XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_enabled=Enable the Machine Translation service XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_enabled.hint=Activates the ability to translate content using a machine translation service XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_targetProperties=Properties to be translated XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_targetProperties.hint=List of class properties and document fields to be translated, separated by a comma. Example: doc.title,doc.content,XWiki.Movie.MovieClass^storyLine XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_targetClasses=Documents to be translated XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_targetClasses.hint=List of classes separated by a comma. Only documents with at least one object of one of these classes will be translatable. If empty, all documents are considered translatable. XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_translator=Translation service XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_translator.hint=Name of the translation service XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_translationNamingStrategy=Translation documents location strategy XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_translationNamingStrategy.hint=Defines how the location of a generated translation gets computed: translations can be stored either at the same location as the original document, or in a space named after their language (e.g. "/en/my-document", "/fr/mon-document" etc). XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_translationNamingStrategy_same=Same location as original document XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_translationNamingStrategy_prefix=In a space named after their language XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_apiKey=Translation service API key XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_apiKey.hint=API key to be used when performing translation operations XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_sameTranslationNameClasses=Documents whose translations must be at same location XWiki.MachineTranslation.MachineTranslationConfigurationClass_sameTranslationNameClasses.hint=List of classes for which the translations must be at the same location as their original document: this field overrides the default translation location strategy defined above. XWiki.MachineTranslation.TranslatorGlossaryConfigurationClass_translatorGlossaryNamePrefix=Prefix to be added to the translator glossary name XWiki.MachineTranslation.TranslatorGlossaryConfigurationClass_translatorGlossaryNamePrefix.hint=This option is useful in particular when using glossaries in multiple wikis.
